data_description.usercodes: The usercode is usually a 4 digit number

user.description: It is highly recommended to use a 'standard' Total Connect user account with Home Assistant. The account should not have full administrative privileges.
user.title: Total Connect 2.0 Account Credentials

data_description.auto_bypass_low_battery: If enabled, Total Connect zones will immediately be bypassed when they report low battery. This option helps because zones tend to report low battery in the middle of the night. The downside of this option is that when the alarm system is armed, the bypassed zone will not be monitored.
data_description.code_required: If enabled, you must enter the user code to arm or disarm the alarm
